headline: Revvity Board Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: WALTHAM, Mass., January 26, 2026--The Board of Directors of Revvity, Inc. (NYSE: RVTY), today declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.07 per share of common stock. This dividend is payable on May 8, 2026 to all shareholders of record at the close of business on April 17, 2026.

headline: Revvity (RVTY) Earnings Expected to Grow: Should You Buy?
summary: Revvity (RVTY) possesses the right combination of the two key ingredients for a likely earnings beat in its upcoming report. Get prepared with the key expectations.
